header.title: THE PROGRAM
header.description: A holistic journey to your complete well-being in the unique universe of Dakhla

1.title: Arrival & Preparation
1.subtitle: Grounding & Opening
1.description: PA gentle start to your wellness getaway. Take the time to settle in, unwind, and reconnect with yourself—far from the stress of everyday life.

2.title: Vitality & Sensory Relaxation
2.subtitle: Deep Letting Go
2.description: A day devoted to awakening the senses and revitalizing the body. Breathe, let go, and allow yourself to be carried by the soothing power of water and therapeutic care.
2.objective: Deep release, cellular oxygenation, muscle relaxation.

3.title: Regeneration & Balance
3.subtitle: Energy Recharge
3.description: Today is all about deep regeneration. Targeted treatments release built-up tension and rebalance your energy for complete relaxation.
3.objective: Boost circulation, refine silhouette, energy recharge.

4.title: Departure & Lasting Serenity
4.subtitle: Final Regeneration
4.description: Your retreat comes to an end, but the benefits linger. You leave with a clearer mind, a deeply relaxed body, and renewed inner balance.
4.objective: Toxin elimination, mental calm, regenerated skin.

items.question: How long has your center been operating?
items.answer: Our center has been operating for over 10 years in Dakhla, with thousands of satisfied clients who have benefited from our holistic treatments.

items.question: What is the price for a treatment?
items.answer: Our stays include all treatments. For an individual treatment, prices start at 400 MAD.

items.question: How many people work on your team?
items.answer: We have a team of 15 certified therapists, specialists in marine treatments and ancient rituals.

items.question: Do you have any job openings?
items.answer: We regularly recruit. Check the Careers section or contact us directly.

items.question: How can I book an appointment with Femellé?
items.answer: You can book online or contact us via the form at the bottom of the page.

items.question: What types of packages do you offer?
items.answer: We offer short stays (3–5 days) with or without accommodation included.
